## AlAxios.post() method

发送 POST 请求

**Signature:**

```typescript
post<T = any>(url: string, data: any, options?: RequestOptionsType): Promise<CommonResultType<T>>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

请求地址


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

any


</td><td>

请求体数据


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[RequestOptionsType](./request.requestoptionstype.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 请求配置选项


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[CommonResultType](./request.commonresulttype.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;

Promise<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->CommonResultType<T>&gt; 请求响应结果

## Example


```typescript
interface CreateUserResponse {
  id: number;
  name: string;
}

// 创建用户
const response = await request.post<CreateUserResponse>(
  '/api/users',
  {
    name: 'John',
    email: 'john@example.com'
  },
  {
    isShowSuccessMessage: true,
    successMessageText: '创建用户成功！'
  }
)
```
